description: Knowledge Base error corrections log for GPT-PANELIN. Records identified errors in KB files for tracking, correction, and persistence across sessions. Each entry in the corrections array follows the schema defined below. See the example entry for the expected format.
usage: When PANELIN produces an incorrect quotation or references wrong data, log the correction here so it can be applied to the source KB file and persist across all future sessions.

schema.kb_file: Name of the affected KB file
schema.field: JSON path or section reference to the incorrect data
schema.wrong_value: The incorrect value that was found
schema.source: How the error was discovered (user correction, validation, audit)
schema.applied_date: Date the correction was applied to the KB file (null if pending)
